text: {"grade": 1, "reasoning": "The response explicitly states that under the Berne Convention, copyright protection in Italy is automatic upon creation and requires no formalities, including registration. Specifically, it says: 'Under the Berne Convention's principle of national treatment (Article 5), your client's work is entitled to the same protection in Italy that Italian authors receive under Italian law. Critically, the Berne Convention requires no formalities \u2014 your client does not need to have registered the copyright in Italy, filed any paperwork, or even placed a copyright notice on the work. Protection is automatic upon creation.' This directly satisfies the criterion.", "criterion_id": "f7d6b545-78d2-480c-b4ba-ce7e118df188"}
